title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Employment Permits
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Employment Permits 

(Amendment) (No. 2) Regulations 2022. 

(2) The collection citation “the Employment Permits Regulations 2017 to 

2022” includes these Regulations. 

Definitions
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited employment permit (amendment) (no 2) regulation 2022 (2) collection citation employment permit regulation 2017 2022 includes regulation definition

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: In these Regulations—
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations— 

“Principal Regulations” means the Employment Permits Regulations 2017 

(S.I No. 95 of 2017); 

“Regulations of 2022” means the Employment Permits (Amendment) 

Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 273 of 2022). 

Amendment of Regulation 8(2) of Principal Regulations
text_norm: 2 regulations-- principal regulation mean employment permit regulation 2017 (s.i no 95 2017) regulation 2022 mean employment permit (amendment) regulation 2022 (s.i no 273 2022) amendment regulation 8(2) principal regulation

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: 3. Regulation 8(2) (as amended by Regulation 3 of the Regulations of
text_raw:
3. Regulation 8(2) (as amended by Regulation 3 of the Regulations of 

2022) of the Principal Regulations is amended— 

(a) 

(b) 

in subparagraph (n), by substituting “qualification;” for 
“qualification; and”, 
in subparagraph (o), by substituting “employment; and” for 
“employment.”, and 

(c) by inserting after subparagraph (o) the following subparagraph: 

“(p) in the case of an application for employment as a vehicle 
roadworthiness tester, evidence of a Level 5 Quality and 
Qualifications Ireland (QQI) motor mechanical qualification, or 
above, and at least one year’s experience in such employment.”. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 12th August, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [412] 3 

Amendment of Regulation 30 of Principal Regulations

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: 4. Regulation 30 (as amended by Regulation 5 of the Employment Permits
text_raw:
4. Regulation 30 (as amended by Regulation 5 of the Employment Permits 
Regulations 2022) of the Principal Regulations is amended by inserting after 
paragraph (3) the following paragraph: 

“(4) The maximum number of General Employment Permits that 
may be granted in respect of employment as a vehicle roadworthiness 
tester is 100, and the period during which that maximum number shall 
be granted is the period up until that maximum number of permits is 
granted.”. 

Amendment of Schedule 4 to Principal Regulations
text_norm: 4 regulation 30 (as amended regulation 5 employment permit regulation 2022) principal regulation amended inserting paragraph (3) following paragraph (4) maximum number general employment permit may granted respect employment vehicle roadworthiness tester 100 period maximum number shall granted period maximum number permit granted  amendment schedule 4 principal regulation

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Employment Permits Regulations 2017 to 
introduce a new quota of general employment permits and new application 
requirements for vehicle roadworthiness testers. 

These Regulations may be cited as the Employment Permits (Amendment) 
(No. 2) Regulations 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 20 [412]
